title: scrubbing servers
extract: data scrubbing (data cleansing) Posted by: Margaret Rouse. Data scrubbing, also called data cleansing, is the process of amending or removing data in a database that is incorrect, incomplete, improperly formatted, or duplicated.
extract_html: data scrubbing (data cleansing) Posted by: Margaret Rouse. Data scrubbing, also called data cleansing, is the process of amending or removing data in a database that is incorrect, incomplete, improperly formatted, or duplicated.
